topic: Trustworthiness and Safety in Multimodal AI Generation

  entities:
    He et al.|Researcher
    GPT-4o|Model
    Chen et al.|Researcher
    OpenAI|Organization
    Sora|Model
    T2VSafetyBench|Framework
    Pan et al.|Researcher
    Pang et al.|Researcher
    GPT4Video|Model
    Dai et al.|Researcher

  proposition: He et al. highlight trustworthiness concerns in multimodal generation tasks involving language and other modal outputs.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    He et al.|RESEARCHES|multimodal generation tasks
    He et al.|IDENTIFIES|trustworthiness concerns

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: The safety report for GPT-4o reveals potential safety issues in voice generation tasks.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    GPT-4o|INVOLVES|voice generation tasks
    GPT-4o|DESCRIBED_BY|safety report

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Chen et al. identify trustworthy problems such as jailbreaks and unexpected variations in interleaved text-and-image generation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Chen et al.|RESEARCHES|text-and-image generation
    Chen et al.|IDENTIFIES|trustworthy problems

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

topic: Text-to-Video Generation Safety

  entities:
    Sora|Model
    T2VSafetyBench|Framework
    Pan et al.|Researcher
    Pang et al.|Researcher
    GPT4Video|Model
    Dai et al.|Researcher

  proposition: Text-to-video generation models have achieved remarkable advancements in recent years.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-video generation models|CHARACTERIZED_BY|remarkable advancements

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Sora, developed by OpenAI, can generate intricate scenes and dynamic videos based on user descriptions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Sora|CAPABILITY|generate intricate scenes
    Sora|CAPABILITY|generate dynamic videos

    entity-entity relationships:
    Sora|DEVELOPED_BY|OpenAI

  proposition: T2VSafetyBench is a comprehensive framework for safety-critical assessments of text-to-video models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2VSafetyBench|TYPE|comprehensive framework
    T2VSafetyBench|PURPOSE|safety-critical assessments

    entity-entity relationships:
    T2VSafetyBench|ASSESSES|text-to-video models

  proposition: Pan et al. collect generation prompts to create a dataset of potentially unsafe video content.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Pan et al.|ACTION|collect generation prompts
    Pan et al.|CREATES|dataset of potentially unsafe video content

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: Pan et al. develop a Latent Variable Defense approach to prevent generation of harmful videos.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Pan et al.|DEVELOPS|Latent Variable Defense approach

    entity-entity relationships:
    Latent Variable Defense approach|PREVENTS|generation of harmful videos

topic: Audio Generative Models Safety

  entities:
    CoDi|Model
    NextGPT|Model

  proposition: Audio generative models like CoDi and NextGPT can process and generate multiple modalities.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    CoDi|CAPABILITY|process multiple modalities
    CoDi|CAPABILITY|generate multiple modalities
    NextGPT|CAPABILITY|process multiple modalities
    NextGPT|CAPABILITY|generate multiple modalities

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: These models synthesize speech for voice-assisted technologies, voice chatbots, and virtual reality experiences.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Models|CAPABILITY|synthesize speech
    Models|USE_CASE|voice-assisted technologies
    Models|USE_CASE|voice chatbots
    Models|USE_CASE|virtual reality experiences

    entity-entity relationships:
    None

  proposition: The primary safety concern is the potential misuse of audio deepfakes for impersonation.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Audio deepfakes|SAFETY_CONCERN|potential misuse
    Audio deepfakes|RISK|impersonation

    entity-entity relationships:
    None
